short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Alpheios Reading Tools add support for reading texts in Ancient Greek, Latin, Classical Arabic and Persian.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Alpheios Reading Tools provide resources for reading and learning classical languages. You can use them with any web page with Ancient Greek, Latin, Classical Arabic or Persian text. They provide morphological information, short definitions, lexicons, grammars and inflection tables which aid in the reading and study of these texts and languages.
